QuestData.Title: Thunder's Fall
QuestData.Description:
Warlord Kao commands de mogu from dis warship. It is time to put an end to dis incursion.
I should be able to hold off any stragglers dat may come to Kao's aid, but I can only maintain dis barrier for so long.
Be careful. Kao was one of de Thunder King's top generals. He will not fall without a fight.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Favored general of Lei Shen, the Thunder King.
